name: AbstractCompletion.complete
initialProofState:
Œ± : Type u
inst‚úù : UniformSpace Œ±
self : AbstractCompletion Œ±
‚ä¢ CompleteSpace self.space
decl:
/-- A completion of `Œ±` is the data of a complete separated uniform space (from the same universe)
and a map from `Œ±` with dense range and inducing the original uniform structure on `Œ±`. -/
structure AbstractCompletion (Œ± : Type u) [UniformSpace Œ±] where
  /-- The underlying space of the completion. -/
  space : Type u
  /-- A map from a space to its completion. -/
  coe : Œ± ‚Üí space
  /-- The completion carries a uniform structure. -/
  uniformStruct : UniformSpace space
  /-- The completion is complete. -/
  complete : CompleteSpace space
  /-- The completion is a T‚ÇÄ space. -/
  separation : T0Space space
  /-- The map into the completion is uniform-inducing. -/
  isUniformInducing : IsUniformInducing coe
  /-- The map into the completion has dense range. -/
  dense : DenseRange coe

theorem induction_on {p : hatŒ± ‚Üí Prop} (a : hatŒ±) (hp : IsClosed { a | p a }) (ih : ‚àÄ a, p (Œπ a)) :
    p a :=
  isClosed_property pkg.dense hp ih a

hg : Continuous g
h : ‚àÄ (a : Œ±), Eq (f (pkg.coe a)) (g (pkg.coe a))
‚ä¢ Eq f g
decl:
protected theorem funext [TopologicalSpace Œ≤] [T2Space Œ≤] {f g : hatŒ± ‚Üí Œ≤} (hf : Continuous f)
    (hg : Continuous g) (h : ‚àÄ a, f (Œπ a) = g (Œπ a)) : f = g :=
  funext fun a => pkg.induction_on a (isClosed_eq hf hg) h

name: AbstractCompletion.extend_def

Œ± : Type u_1

‚ä¢ Eq (pkg.extend f) (‚ãØ.extend f)
decl:
theorem extend_def (hf : UniformContinuous f) : pkg.extend f = pkg.isDenseInducing.extend f :=
  if_pos hf

name: AbstractCompletion.extend_coe
initialProofState:
Œ± : Type u_1
inst‚úù¬≤ : UniformSpace Œ±

‚ä¢ Eq (pkg.extend f (pkg.coe a)) (f a)
decl:
theorem extend_coe [T2Space Œ≤] (hf : UniformContinuous f) (a : Œ±) : (pkg.extend f) (Œπ a) = f a := by
  rw [pkg.extend_def hf]
  exact pkg.isDenseInducing.extend_eq hf.continuous a

name: AbstractCompletion.uniformContinuous_extend
initialProofState:
Œ± : Type u_1
inst‚úù¬≤ : UniformSpace Œ±
pkg : AbstractCompletion Œ±
Œ≤ : Type u_2
inst‚úù¬π : UniformSpace Œ≤
f : Œ± ‚Üí Œ≤
inst‚úù : CompleteSpace Œ≤
‚ä¢ UniformContinuous (pkg.extend f)
decl:
theorem uniformContinuous_extend : UniformContinuous (pkg.extend f) := by
  by_cases hf : UniformContinuous f
  ¬∑ rw [pkg.extend_def hf]
    exact uniformContinuous_uniformly_extend pkg.isUniformInducing pkg.dense hf
  ¬∑ change UniformContinuous (ite _ _ _)
    rw [if_neg hf]
    exact uniformContinuous_of_const fun a b => by congr 1

name: AbstractCompletion.extend_unique
initialProofState:
Œ± : Type u_1

Œ≤ : Type u_2

f : Œ± ‚Üí Œ≤

g : pkg.space ‚Üí Œ≤

‚ä¢ Eq (pkg.extend f) g
decl:
theorem extend_unique (hf : UniformContinuous f) {g : hatŒ± ‚Üí Œ≤} (hg : UniformContinuous g)
    (h : ‚àÄ a : Œ±, f a = g (Œπ a)) : pkg.extend f = g := by
  apply pkg.funext pkg.continuous_extend hg.continuous
  simpa only [pkg.extend_coe hf] using h

name: AbstractCompletion.extend_comp_coe
initialProofState:
Œ± : Type u_1

inst‚úù : T0Space Œ≤
f : pkg.space ‚Üí Œ≤
hf : UniformContinuous f
‚ä¢ Eq (pkg.extend (Function.comp f pkg.coe)) f
decl:
@[simp]
theorem extend_comp_coe {f : hatŒ± ‚Üí Œ≤} (hf : UniformContinuous f) : pkg.extend (f ‚àò Œπ) = f :=
  funext fun x =>
    pkg.induction_on x (isClosed_eq pkg.continuous_extend hf.continuous) fun y =>
      pkg.extend_coe (hf.comp <| pkg.uniformContinuous_coe) y

@[simp]
theorem map_coe (hf : UniformContinuous f) (a : Œ±) : map f (Œπ a) = Œπ' (f a) :=

name: AbstractCompletion.map_unique
initialProofState:
Œ± : Type u_1
inst‚úù¬π : UniformSpace Œ±
pkg : AbstractCompletion Œ±
Œ≤ : Type u_2
inst‚úù : UniformSpace Œ≤
pkg' : AbstractCompletion Œ≤
f : Œ± ‚Üí Œ≤
g : pkg.space ‚Üí pkg'.space
hg : UniformContinuous g
h : ‚àÄ (a : Œ±), Eq (pkg'.coe (f a)) (g (pkg.coe a))
‚ä¢ Eq (pkg.map pkg' f) g
decl:
theorem map_unique {f : Œ± ‚Üí Œ≤} {g : hatŒ± ‚Üí hatŒ≤} (hg : UniformContinuous g)
    (h : ‚àÄ a, Œπ' (f a) = g (Œπ a)) : map f = g :=
  pkg.funext (pkg.continuous_map _ _) hg.continuous <| by
    intro a
    change pkg.extend (Œπ' ‚àò f) _ = _
    simp_rw [Function.comp_def, h, ‚Üê comp_apply (f := g)]
    rw [pkg.extend_coe (hg.comp pkg.uniformContinuous_coe)]

name: AbstractCompletion.map_id
initialProofState:
Œ± : Type u_1
inst‚úù : UniformSpace Œ±
pkg : AbstractCompletion Œ±

decl:
@[simp]
theorem map_id : pkg.map pkg id = id :=
  pkg.map_unique pkg uniformContinuous_id fun _ => rfl

name: AbstractCompletion.extend_map
initialProofState:
Œ± : Type u_1
inst‚úù‚Å¥ : UniformSpace Œ±
pkg : AbstractCompletion Œ±
Œ≤ : Type u_2
inst‚úù¬≥ : UniformSpace Œ≤
pkg' : AbstractCompletion Œ≤
Œ≥ : Type u_3
inst‚úù¬≤ : UniformSpace Œ≥
inst‚úù¬π : CompleteSpace Œ≥
inst‚úù : T0Space Œ≥
f : Œ≤ ‚Üí Œ≥
g : Œ± ‚Üí Œ≤
hf : UniformContinuous f
hg : UniformContinuous g
‚ä¢ Eq (Function.comp (pkg'.extend f) (pkg.map pkg' g)) (pkg.extend (Function.comp f g))
decl:
theorem extend_map [CompleteSpace Œ≥] [T0Space Œ≥] {f : Œ≤ ‚Üí Œ≥} {g : Œ± ‚Üí Œ≤}
    (hf : UniformContinuous f) (hg : UniformContinuous g) :
    pkg'.extend f ‚àò map g = pkg.extend (f ‚àò g) :=
  pkg.funext (pkg'.continuous_extend.comp (pkg.continuous_map pkg' _)) pkg.continuous_extend
    fun a => by
    rw [pkg.extend_coe (hf.comp hg), comp_apply, pkg.map_coe pkg' hg, pkg'.extend_coe hf]
    rfl

name: AbstractCompletion.map_comp
initialProofState:

f : Œ± ‚Üí Œ≤
hg : UniformContinuous g
hf : UniformContinuous f
‚ä¢ Eq (Function.comp (pkg'.map pkg'' g) (pkg.map pkg' f)) (pkg.map pkg'' (Function.comp g f))
decl:
theorem map_comp {g : Œ≤ ‚Üí Œ≥} {f : Œ± ‚Üí Œ≤} (hg : UniformContinuous g) (hf : UniformContinuous f) :
    pkg'.map pkg'' g ‚àò pkg.map pkg' f = pkg.map pkg'' (g ‚àò f) :=
  pkg.extend_map pkg' (pkg''.uniformContinuous_coe.comp hg) hf

name: AbstractCompletion.uniformContinuous_compare
initialProofState:

‚ä¢ UniformContinuous (pkg.compare pkg')
decl:

name: AbstractCompletion.compare_coe
initialProofState:
Œ± : Type u_1
inst‚úù : UniformSpace Œ±
pkg pkg' : AbstractCompletion Œ±
a : Œ±
‚ä¢ Eq (pkg.compare pkg' (pkg.coe a)) (pkg'.coe a)
decl:
theorem compare_coe (a : Œ±) : pkg.compare pkg' (pkg.coe a) = pkg'.coe a :=
  pkg.extend_coe pkg'.uniformContinuous_coe a

name: AbstractCompletion.inverse_compare
initialProofState:
Œ± : Type u_1
inst‚úù : UniformSpace Œ±
pkg pkg' : AbstractCompletion Œ±
‚ä¢ Eq (Function.comp (pkg.compare pkg') (pkg'.compare pkg)) id
decl:
theorem inverse_compare : pkg.compare pkg' ‚àò pkg'.compare pkg = id := by
  have uc := pkg.uniformContinuous_compare pkg'
  have uc' := pkg'.uniformContinuous_compare pkg
  apply pkg'.funext (uc.comp uc').continuous continuous_id
  intro a
  rw [comp_apply, pkg'.compare_coe pkg, pkg.compare_coe pkg']
  rfl

name: AbstractCompletion.compare_comp_eq_compare
initialProofState:
Œ± : Type u_1
inst‚úù¬≤ : UniformSpace Œ±
pkg pkg' : AbstractCompletion Œ±
Œ≥ : Type u_3
inst‚úù¬π : TopologicalSpace Œ≥
inst‚úù : T3Space Œ≥
f : Œ± ‚Üí Œ≥
cont_f : Continuous f
a‚úù : ‚àÄ (a : pkg.space), Filter.Tendsto f (Filter.comap pkg.coe (nhds a)) (nhds (‚ãØ.extend f a))
‚ä¢ Eq (Function.comp (‚ãØ.extend f) (pkg'.compare pkg)) (‚ãØ.extend f)
decl:
theorem compare_comp_eq_compare (Œ≥ : Type*) [TopologicalSpace Œ≥]
    [T3Space Œ≥] {f : Œ± ‚Üí Œ≥} (cont_f : Continuous f) :
    letI := pkg.uniformStruct.toTopologicalSpace
    letI := pkg'.uniformStruct.toTopologicalSpace
    (‚àÄ a : pkg.space,
      Filter.Tendsto f (Filter.comap pkg.coe (ùìù a)) (ùìù ((pkg.isDenseInducing.extend f) a))) ‚Üí
      pkg.isDenseInducing.extend f ‚àò pkg'.compare pkg = pkg'.isDenseInducing.extend f := by
  let _ := pkg'.uniformStruct
  let _ := pkg.uniformStruct
  intro h
  have (x : Œ±) : (pkg.isDenseInducing.extend f ‚àò pkg'.compare pkg) (pkg'.coe x) = f x := by
    simp only [Function.comp_apply, compare_coe, IsDenseInducing.extend_eq _ cont_f, implies_true]
  apply (IsDenseInducing.extend_unique (AbstractCompletion.isDenseInducing _) this
    (Continuous.comp _ (uniformContinuous_compare pkg' pkg).continuous )).symm
  apply IsDenseInducing.continuous_extend
  exact fun a ‚Ü¶ ‚ü®(pkg.isDenseInducing.extend f) a, h a‚ü©

name: AbstractCompletion.extension‚ÇÇ_coe_coe
initialProofState:
Œ± : Type u_1
inst‚úù¬≥ : UniformSpace Œ±

‚ä¢ Eq (pkg.extend‚ÇÇ pkg' f (pkg.coe a) (pkg'.coe b)) (f a b)
decl:
theorem extension‚ÇÇ_coe_coe (hf : UniformContinuous <| uncurry f) (a : Œ±) (b : Œ≤) :
    pkg.extend‚ÇÇ pkg' f (Œπ a) (Œπ' b) = f a b :=
  show (pkg.prod pkg').extend (uncurry f) ((pkg.prod pkg').coe (a, b)) = uncurry f (a, b) from
    (pkg.prod pkg').extend_coe hf _

theorem uniformContinuous_extension‚ÇÇ : UniformContinuous‚ÇÇ (pkg.extend‚ÇÇ pkg' f) := by

theorem continuous_map‚ÇÇ {Œ¥} [TopologicalSpace Œ¥] {f : Œ± ‚Üí Œ≤ ‚Üí Œ≥} {a : Œ¥ ‚Üí hatŒ±} {b : Œ¥ ‚Üí hatŒ≤}
    (ha : Continuous a) (hb : Continuous b) :
